div.ab:
بسم اللّه الرّحمن الرّحيم
أبقاك اللّه وحفظك وأمنه لك
قد أدخل أوصل لك إلى الثّلثة الغلام الــدنانير
وقد أنفذ أثبتّ عليك قات ثلث وقرط
أبقاك اللّه وحفظك وأمنه وآمين لــك

bi smi ăl lāhi ăr raḥmāni ăr raḥīmi
ʾabqā ka ăl lāhu wa ḥafiẓa ka wa ʾamnu hu la ka
qad ʾudḫila ʾūṣila la ʾilà ka ăṯ ăl ṯalāṯaẗu ġulāmi ăd danānīri danānīru
wa qad ʾunfiḏa ʾaṯbattu ʿalay ka qāt:un ṯalāṯ qirāṭ wa qurṭ:un
*** ʾabqā ka ăl lāhu wa ḥafiẓa ka wa ʾamnu ʾāmīn hu la ka
*** ***

In the name of God the merciful and compassionate. In the name of God, the merciful and compassionate.
May God preserve you and protect you! May God preserve you and protect you. I ask him to grant you security.
Dem Burschen sind die Dinare übergeben worden, The three dīnārs have been entered (in the account) for you
and dried and fresh clover have been sent to you. and dried and fresh trefoil have been sent to you. und ich habe zu Deinen Lasten drei (Dinar) und 1 Qīrāṭ verbucht.
[May God preserve you] and protect you! [May God preserve you] and protect you. I ask him to grant you security.
